query:
SELECT
                g.room_id as room,
                g.id,
                r.room_type as "game_type: RoomType",
                g.x,
                g.o,
                g.winner,
                g.init_player as "init_player: Player",
                jsonb_agg(
                    jsonb_build_object(
                        'row', gm.row,
                        'col', gm.col,
                        'player', gm.player
                    ) ORDER BY gm.turn
                ) AS moves
            FROM
                game g
            join room r
                on r.id = g.room_id
            LEFT JOIN
                game_move gm
                ON g.id = gm.game_id
            where g.room_id IN (SELECT unnest($1::uuid[])) and g.status != 'ended'
            GROUP BY
                g.id, r.room_type;
